item.title: Bible Doctrine (Second Edition)
item.description: Info ยง Author: Wayne Grudem Publication Date: 05 April 2022 Pages: 672 Tags:#faith,#faith/doctrine 1 - Introduction to Systematic Theology ยง Define systematic theology and discuss its relationship with other theological disciplines (historical theology, philosophical theology, apologetics, Old Testament theology, New Testament theology, and biblical theology).

item.title: 01 - Genesis

item.title: Gen 1
item.description: Genesis 1 ยง 1 ยง In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth. 2 ยง The earth was without form and void, and darkness was over the face of the deep.

item.title: Gen 10
item.description: Genesis 10 ยง 1 ยง These are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth. Sons were born to them after the flood. 2 ยง The sons of Japheth: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech, and Tiras.

item.title: Gen 11
item.description: Genesis 11 ยง 1 ยง Now the whole earth had one language and the same words. 2 ยง And as people migrated from the east, they found a plain in the land of Shinar and settled there.

item.title: Gen 12
item.description: Genesis 12 ยง 1 ยง Now the LORD said to Abram, โGo from your country and your kindred and your fatherโs house to the land that I will show you. 2 ยง And I will make of you a great nation, and I will bless you and make your name great, so that you will be a blessing.

item.title: Gen 13
item.description: Genesis 13 ยง 1 ยง So Abram went up from Egypt, he and his wife and all that he had, and Lot with him, into the Negeb. 2 ยง Now Abram was very rich in livestock, in silver, and in gold.

item.title: Gen 14
item.description: Genesis 14 ยง 1 ยง In the days of Amraphel king of Shinar, Arioch king of Ellasar, Chedorlaomer king of Elam, and Tidal king of Goiim, 2 ยง these kings made war with Bera king of Sodom, Birsha king of Gomorrah, Shinab king of Admah, Shemeber king of Zeboiim, and the king of Bela (that is, Zoar).

item.title: Gen 15
item.description: Genesis 15 ยง 1 ยง After these things the word of the LORD came to Abram in a vision: โFear not, Abram, I am your shield; your reward shall be very great.

item.title: Gen 16
item.description: Genesis 16 ยง 1 ยง Now Sarai, Abramโs wife, had borne him no children. She had a female Egyptian servant whose name was Hagar. 2 ยง And Sarai said to Abram, โBehold now, the LORD has prevented me from bearing children.
